title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter a valid email address and strong password
Submit the registration form
Check that registration completes with a success message and user receives verification email

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that user can login successfully with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Verify that user is logged in and redirected to dashboard or homepage

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Check that login fails with invalid password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input registered email with incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify login is denied and error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed

title: Multi-language Toggle English to Arabic
description: Verify UI texts switch correctly between English and Arabic languages and layout adjusts for RTL.

steps.description: Load homepage with English language set
Switch language to Arabic using language selector
Verify all UI texts appear in Arabic and layout changes to RTL orientation

title: Currency Conversion Accuracy
description: Verify that product prices are correctly converted when switching between supported currencies.

steps.description: Set currency to default and note displayed product prices
Change currency to another supported currency (e.g., USD to SAR)
Verify displayed prices update accurately according to latest exchange rates

title: Add Physical Book to Shopping Cart
description: Verify user can add a physical book from product page to persistent shopping cart.

steps.description: Browse catalog and select a physical book
Click on 'Add to Cart' button
Check that book is added to cart and cart count updates

title: Add eBook Sample Preview Availability
description: Verify that sample preview of an eBook can be accessed and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to an eBook product page
Click on sample preview button
Verify that sample pages load and display correctly with navigation controls

title: Checkout with Multiple Payment Methods
description: Verify the checkout process for each supported payment method: Stripe, PayPal, Tabby installment, and Cash on Delivery.

steps.description: Add items to cart and proceed to checkout
Select Stripe payment option, enter valid payment details, and complete purchase
Verify order confirmation and payment success
Repeat with PayPal payment integration and confirm success
Verify order confirmation and payment success
Repeat with Tabby installment plan, verify installments terms, complete purchase
Verify order confirmation with installment schedule
Repeat with Cash on Delivery and submit order
Verify order placed and COD payment selected

title: Order Status Lifecycle and Tracking
description: Verify real-time order status updates and tracking notifications for an order from placement to delivery.

steps.description: Place an order using any payment method
Verify order status is initially 'Processing'
Simulate status change to 'Shipped' and update through shipping provider integration
Verify tracking number is available and status updates in user interface
Simulate status change to 'Delivered'
Verify final delivery confirmation and notification sent to user

title: Role-Based Access Control for Admin and User
description: Verify that system enforces proper access levels between administrators, publishers, authors, and regular customers.

steps.description: Login as an administrator
Verify access to admin dashboard, analytics, and management pages
Login as a publisher or author user
Verify access to manuscript submission, publishing workflow, and book catalog management is granted
Login as a regular customer
Verify access to shopping, profile management, and order history but not to admin or publishing services

title: Publishing Manuscript Submission Workflow
description: Test uploading and submitting a manuscript, following editorial review stages to final approval.

steps.description: Login as author and navigate to publishing services portal
Upload manuscript file via Firebase Storage uploader
Submit manuscript and verify status changes to 'Under Review'
Simulate editorial approval, verify status update to 'Approved'
Verify author can see final approved status and marketing options

title: Content Management Blog Creation and Editing
description: Verify ability to create, edit, and publish blog posts using the rich text editor.

steps.description: Login as admin or editor
Navigate to blog management and create a new post
Use rich text editor to add content including images and links
Save draft, edit content, and then publish the post
Verify the post appears on public blog page with correct formatting

title: Search Books with Multi-Category Filter
description: Verify that advanced search filters allow narrowing product search by categories, authors, and formats.

steps.description: Navigate to search page and enter a keyword
Apply filters for physical books, specific author, and language
Verify search results reflect applied filters correctly

title: File Upload Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify that file uploads for manuscripts and images validate file size, type and handle errors gracefully.

steps.description: Attempt to upload unsupported file type (e.g., .exe file) for manuscript
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid file type
Attempt to upload file exceeding maximum allowed size
Verify error informs user about file size limit

title: Persistent Shopping Cart on User Logout and Login
description: Verify cart contents persist across user sessions including guest and authenticated users.

steps.description: As guest user, add books to cart
Logout or close browser
Reopen site and verify cart still contains previously added items
Login with existing user account
Verify cart merges with any user saved cart items

title: Security Test for Data Encryption and PCI Compliance
description: Verify payment data and sensitive user data is encrypted in storage and during transmission, meeting PCI DSS standards.

steps.description: Initiate a payment process and monitor network traffic
Confirm that payment information is transmitted using secure HTTPS and encrypted API calls
Verify database encryption for sensitive user fields and tokens
Ensure compliance banners or audit reports confirm PCI DSS adherence

title: Accessibility Compliance for WCAG 2.1 AA
description: Validate the platform’s UI supports keyboard navigation, screen readers, and appropriate contrast including RTL support.

steps.description: Navigate through main pages using only keyboard
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and usable
Use screen reader to browse key pages
Verify content is read properly and form labels are descriptive
Switch UI to Arabic language and verify RTL layout and similar accessibility standards
Confirm proper tab order and focus states in RTL layout

title: Shipping Cost Calculation with Multiple Carrier Options
description: Verify that shipping costs are accurately calculated based on weight, destination, and selected carrier.

steps.description: Add physical books of known weight to cart
Proceed to shipping selection and enter destination region
Verify multiple carrier options appear with correct price calculations
Select different carriers and verify total order price updates accordingly

title: Subscription Plan Purchase and Recurring Payment
description: Verify user can subscribe to premium content plans and recurring payments are processed successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription checkout page
Select subscription plan and enter payment details
Complete initial payment
Verify subscription activation and scheduled recurring payments
Simulate next payment cycle
Verify recurring payment succeeds and subscription remains active

title: Analytics Dashboard Data Accuracy
description: Verify real-time analytics and reporting dashboard displays correct data from orders, sales, and user behaviour.

steps.description: Generate multiple transactions covering different product types and users
Access analytics dashboard as admin
Verify dashboard charts, counts, and reports match the generated data accurately

title: Error Handling on Payment Gateway Failures
description: Simulate payment service unavailability and verify system handles errors gracefully with user notifications.

steps.description: Attempt payment with Stripe while disabling Stripe API
Verify payment failure is detected and a clear error message is displayed to the user
Repeat with PayPal, Tabby, and COD to verify consistent error handling

title: UI Component Consistency Across Pages
description: Verify Radix UI components and custom React UI components render consistently with expected styles across different pages.

steps.description: Open multiple modules such as book pages, checkout, dashboard, and blog editor
Check buttons, dialogs, dropdown menus, toasts, and form inputs render with consistent styling and responsiveness

title: Legal Pages Content and Accessibility
description: Verify availability and correctness of legal pages including privacy policy, terms of service, and return policy.

steps.description: Navigate to legal pages from footer or settings links
Verify the content matches the legal markdown files and pages are properly accessible and formatted

title: Performance Testing Under Load
description: Verify system performance with multiple concurrent users browsing, ordering, and managing content.

steps.description: Simulate 1000 concurrent users performing browsing, search, and checkout
Verify page load times remain under SLA thresholds and errors rates stay minimal
